price: 73. Kuwa gaalada ah qaaroodba xulufo buu u yahay qaarka kale, haddii aydaan  (Muslimiintoy) sameyn sidaa oo kale, waxaa jiri dhulka fasahaad weyn17.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٍۚ إِلَّا تَفۡعَلُوهُ تَكُن فِتۡنَةٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَفَسَادٞ كَبِيرٞ
footnotes: 17. Nabigu s.c.w. wuxuu yidhi: “Haddii la magaacabo labo madaxweyne (khaliifo oo ay isku qabsadaan xukunka) dila labada midkoodii dambeeyey ee gardaran”. W.w. Muslim. Marka waa inay muslimiinta oo idil leeyihiin  hal khaliifo (madaxwyne) oo ay is baheystaan dhammaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin illā tafʿalūhu takun fit'natun fī al-arḍi wafasādun kabīrun
